name: roblox-creator-docs
title: Roblox Creator Docs
description: Fast look-up for Roblox Creator Docs
author: ben_rowlands

commands.name: creator-docs
commands.title: Roblox Creator Docs
commands.subtitle: Search Creator Docs
commands.description: Browse and open Roblox Creator Docs in default browser

preferences.name: hideIcons
preferences.title: Hide Icons
preferences.label: Hide icons in search results
preferences.description: When enabled, icons will not be displayed next to search results

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
